MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer, affecting properties in Leswalt and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have we have established an overhead line fault on our network and also further investigations are required and we now expect your supply to be restored by 11:30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:03 PM on Sunday, 22 November 2020
